hero.name: Andreia Semedo
hero.intro: Passionate about technology, innovation, software quality, and information security.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: I am a Computer and Information Engineering graduate from the University of Cabo Verde, with a passion for technology, innovation, and software quality.
about.paragraph2: As a Software Test Engineer, Developer, and Cybersecurity enthusiast, I have a deep interest in Information Security and Software Quality. I seek new professional challenges and market opportunities. The development of my skills and the generation of positive results are my objectives.
about.paragraph3: Currently based in Bela Vista, Praia, Cabo Verde, I am open to remote and international opportunities that allow me to contribute to innovative projects and continue growing professionally.
about.paragraph4: My journey in technology has been driven by curiosity and a commitment to excellence. I believe in the power of continuous learning and the importance of building secure, high-quality software solutions. I have experience in effective communication, leadership, collaboration, planning, and project management.
about.aiParagraph1: Computer and Information Engineering graduate from the University of Cabo Verde. Specialized in software testing, web development, and information security. Proven experience in manual testing execution, bug identification and reporting across multiple platforms (Tester Work, Test IO, Testlio, uTest).
about.aiParagraph2: Proficient in multiple programming languages (C, Java 21, Python, PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript) and frameworks (React, Next.js, Node.js, Laravel, Yii, Django, Spring Boot). Experience in web application development, RESTful APIs, databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite) and Android development.
about.aiParagraph3: Based in Bela Vista, Praia, Cabo Verde. Available for remote and international opportunities. Seeking new professional challenges and market opportunities, with focus on Software Testing, Software Development or Cybersecurity.
about.aiParagraph4: Certified in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI 2025) and Back End Development (Oracle & Alura). Pan-African Youth Ambassador for Internet Governance. Strong understanding of security principles (encryption, access control, data protection), Agile/Scrum methodologies and project management tools (Jira, Trello).

contact.title: Get In
contact.name: Name
contact.thankYou: Thank you for your message! In a production environment, this would be sent to a backend server.

pwa.installPrompt: Install this app for a better experience

1.title: Software Test Engineer
1.description: Execution of manual tests, identification and reporting of bugs in diverse projects. Experience in platforms: Tester Work, Test IO, Testlio and uTest.

2.title: Intern in Development Support and Technical Documentation
2.description: Creation of technical and user manuals for applications. Systems analysis, development support, and use of Trello for task and progress management.

3.title: Software Development Internship
3.description: Web application development using Laravel framework (PHP). Use of XAMPP for local database management (MySQL). Participation in client meetings for requirements gathering and solution presentation. Support in analysis and implementation of improvements in developed systems.

4.title: Developer Tester Internship
4.description: System testing execution and support in GitLab repository management. Optimization and management of relational databases (PostgreSQL). Requirements analysis and feature implementation with Yii PHP. Contribution to web application development and maintenance.

5.title: Startup Founder
5.description: Participation in technological and innovation project development. Prototype development and business creation strategies. Entrepreneurship skills enhancement and innovative project execution.

1.title: University of Cabo Verde Residency Management Platform
1.description: Development of a digital platform for managing applications, residents, and accommodations using Django, React, and PostgreSQL. Final Degree Project.

2.title: NhaLiXu
2.description: Development of a digital solution for direct communication between the population and the Municipal Council, improving waste collection service efficiency.

3.title: Sentiment Analysis API
3.description: Development of a complete platform for sentiment analysis using Spring Boot 3 and React, integrating Machine Learning models (ONNX) for real-time and batch processing of e-commerce feedback.
